subSubSection.paragraph: China (Gansu, Shandong, Zhejiang, Taiwan); Italy, Japan, Russia, South Korea, Switzerland and the United States ( Talamas et al. 2017 , Sabbatini Peverieri et al. 2018 , Stahl et al. 2018 ).

Host associations. This species has previously been recorded emerging from the eggs of
Halyomorpha halys
( Stal ) in China (Yang et al. 2009). In this study, we found that this species has also been reared from the eggs of
Erthesina fullo
(Thunberg) ( Pentatomidae ),
Rhaphigaster nebulosa
(Poda) ( Pentatomidae ) and some other unidentified species of Pentatomidae .
